article.title: Booz Allen Hamilton Wins Contract with U.S. Air Force
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Booz Allen Hamilton has been awarded an indefinite delivery/indefinite quantity contract for a maximum of $95 million. This action will provide professional defense, science, engineering and technical non-personal advisory and assistance support services. The U.S. Air Force District of Washington/A7KI, Anacostia Annex, D.C., is the contracting activity.
